Description: 
--------------------- 
Portal 2 is the sequel to the original game, and returns with the winning formula of innovation in gameplay, story and music. It is recalled that Portal 1 and won more than 70 awards and praise from the industry and laid the foundations of a community with plenty of followers. Individual mode of Portal 2 presents a dynamic cast of new characters in a new and challenging puzzles that will take place in different and complicated situations. Gamers will explore areas of Aperture Science Laboratories and meet with GLaDOS, a computer, traveling companion, and sometimes murderer who led them in the original game. 
The campaign co-op mode incorporates a fully independent with a unique history, new challenges, two new characters. This new game mode requires players to reflect on what they thought they knew about the portals. To succeed in testing the players must not only complement, but should also think cooperatively. 

Features: 
------------------------- 
- Single-player campaign. Fascinating and unusual gameplay will make you forget time and not let off the screen for several hours. 
- A game for two players. Independent story, new characters and unique gameplay features. 
- Improved physics. On Portal 2, all became more interesting, unusual and confusing, but not harder! 
- Music Vision. The original soundtrack is perfectly suited to the unusual atmosphere of the world of Portal. 

System requirements: 
----------------------------------- 
System: Windows 7 / Vista / XP 
Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher) 
Memory: XP 1GB / 2GB Vista 
Hard disk: At least 7.6 GB of space 
Video: Video card must be 128 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 compatible with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or above / Nvidia GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel graphics HD 2000 or higher). 
Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
